keywords.value: The Daily Show with Jon Stewart (TV Program)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: A five-week boot-camp-style introduction to the television industry, exclusively for military veterans, began with the host of “The Daily Show.”

headline.print_headline: And Now, Your Moment of Helping Returning Troops
headline.main: Jon Stewart, Iraq War Critic, Runs a Program That Helps Veterans Enter TV

snippet: A five-week boot-camp-style introduction to the television industry, exclusively for military veterans, began with the host of “The Daily Show.”
abstract: Comedy Central's Daily Show host Jon Stewart reveals that, for past three years, he has run five-week boot camp for military veterans, training them for jobs in television; Stewart kept project low key but says that now, after deciding to leave Daily Show, he wants project to become visible in hopes that others in industry will follow his example.
